synopsis.text: The XY&Z anime series continues the story of Ash Ketchum and his friends Serena, Clemont, and Bonnie as they journey across the Kalos region. Bonnie has befriended the mysterious Pokémon Zygarde, referring to it as "Squishy." As the journey unfolds, secrets surrounding the legendary Pokémon Zygarde come to light. A strange phenomenon also begins occurring, which only affects Ash's Greninja. Meanwhile, Ash and his friends repeatedly cross paths with Alain and the villainous Team Flare organization, suggesting an impending confrontation. When Zygarde's secrets and the mystery behind the phenomenon are finally revealed, the Kalos region faces its greatest danger yet. Ash and his loyal Pokémon will have to work together with his companions if they hope to protect Kalos from destruction. Along the way, Satoshi's bond with his Greninja will be tested like never before.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
